customer_actions: Seeks information on using OpenAI API/tools
Searches for solutions to specific use cases in the forum
Contacts support via Help Center (for account or billing issues - implied)
Evaluates potential use cases and functionalities
pain_points: Difficulty understanding technical aspects of the API
Lack of clear examples and tutorials
Finding relevant information across multiple sources
opportunities: Enhanced search functionality within the forum and website
Clearer communication about pricing and support options

customer_actions: Starts using the API or tools
Experiments with different models and functionalities
pain_points: Insufficient documentation for specific use cases
Lack of clear guidance for different developer skill levels
opportunities: More extensive code examples and tutorials
Simplified API documentation with improved search
Enhanced error messages and debugging tools
Tiered support based on developer experience

customer_actions: Seeks help in the developer forum
Provides feedback on the platform and API
pain_points: Insufficient community support in the forum
Lack of proactive communication from OpenAI about updates or changes
opportunities: Clearer communication regarding API updates and changes
More responsive and effective customer support channels
More active moderation and engagement in the developer forum
Proactive outreach to address common issues and provide updates

customer_actions: Continues to use and integrate OpenAI's products
pain_points: Lack of incentives for continued usage
Limited opportunities for engagement with OpenAI team
opportunities: Opportunities for feedback and collaboration with OpenAI team

optimization.current_state: Documentation is comprehensive but can be difficult to navigate and understand for novice developers.
optimization.target_state: Improved, more intuitive documentation with clear examples, tutorials, and interactive elements. Streamlined onboarding process for new users.
recommendations: Tiered onboarding based on developer experience
optimization.expected_impact: Increased user satisfaction, reduced friction in onboarding, improved API adoption rate

optimization.current_state: Support channels exist but may not be readily accessible or responsive.
optimization.target_state: Improved response times, multiple support channels with clearly defined response expectations, proactive communication about issues and updates.
recommendations: Invest in more customer support staff
Implement a ticketing system for efficient issue tracking
Proactive communication about planned outages or changes
optimization.expected_impact: Increased customer satisfaction, reduced churn, improved brand reputation

optimization.current_state: Developer forum exists but engagement could be improved.
optimization.target_state: More active community engagement, enhanced community features, increased OpenAI team participation.
recommendations: More active moderation and community management
Direct lines of communication between OpenAI team and community members
optimization.expected_impact: Increased community loyalty, improved product feedback, identification of potential issues
